Lyric:
[00:18.63]Some folks are born made to wave the flag
[00:22.22]Ooh they're red, white and blue
[00:25.86]And when the band plays Hail to the Chief
[00:29.42]Ooh, they point the cannon at you, Lord
[00:33.16]It ain't me, it ain't me
[00:36.74]I ain't no senator's son, son
[00:40.43]It ain't me, it ain't me
[00:43.98]I ain't no fortunate one, no
[00:47.42]Some folks are born silver spoon in hand
[00:51.80]Lord, don't they help themselves, no
[00:54.66]But when the taxman comes to the door
[00:58.31]Lord, the house looks like a rummage sale, yeah
[01:02.90]It ain't me, it ain't me
[01:05.52]I ain't no millionaire's son, no no
[01:09.29]It ain't me, it ain't me
[01:12.76]I ain't no fortunate one, no
[01:30.99]Some folks inherit star spangled eyes
[01:34.61]Ooh, they send you down to war, Lord
[01:38.18]And when you ask them, "How much should we give?"
[01:41.82]Ooh, they only answer More, more, more!
[01:45.63]It ain't me, it ain't me
[01:49.90]I ain't no military son, son
[01:52.91]It ain't me, it ain't me
[01:56.34]I ain't no fortunate one, one
[02:00.30]It ain't me, it ain't me
[02:03.53]I ain't no fortunate one, no no no
[02:07.22]It ain't me, it ain't me
[02:10.70]I ain't no fortunate son, no no no
